statements: DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE city='New York' AND country='USA';
DELETE FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 30 AND weather_condition='Sunny';
DELETE FROM weather_forecast WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 30;
DELETE FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 'b4a28793-22a2-4bef-a745-2b2ef07f5b61' AND location_id = 'b4a28793-22a2-4bef-a745-2b2ef07f5b62';
DELETE FROM cities WHERE city_name = 'New York';
DELETE FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature < 10 AND forecast_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM weather_conditions WHERE condition_id IN (SELECT condition_id FROM weather_conditions WHERE forecast_id = 100) AND condition = 'Rain';
